pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, April 27, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception hosted by Canada’s Building Trades Unions and deliver remarks.

Closed to media
